meanings.definition: Paper on which newspapers are printed.
meanings.sent1: The newsprint was stacked high in the printing press.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the smell of fresh newsprint in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat left paw prints on the newsprint.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were written on the newsprint of her journal.
meanings.sent5: The newsprint crinkled under his fingers as he turned the page.

meanings.definition: The ink used in printing newspapers.
meanings.sent1: The newsprint was running low, so they had to order more.
meanings.sent2: The newsprint smudged on my fingers as I read the paper.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled newsprint on her shirt and it looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The newsprint stained his hands black as he worked on the printing press.
meanings.sent5: The newsprint soaked into the paper, leaving a permanent mark.
